casebody.data:
Charles G. Morgenroth and Marie Morgenroth, appellees, v. Midland Oil Company, appellant.Gen. No. 37,594.

McSurely, J., dissenting.

Opinion filed February 25, 1935.Cassels, Potter & Bentley and Edward J. Rothman, for appellant; Ralph F. Potter, Leslie H. Vogel and E. Douglas Schwantes, of counsel. Bernard W. Vinissky and Julius S. Neale, for appellees. Mr. Justice Hatchett

delivered the opinion of the court.
